instruction: This code is an IBM Storwize V7000 autodiscovery script for Zabbix. To use it, run svc_perf_discovery_sender.py with the following options: --debug (to enable debug output), --clusters <svc1>[,<svc2>...] (comma-separated Storwize node list), --user <username> (Storwize V7000 user account with Administrator role), --password <pwd> (user password), and --discovery-types <type1>,[type2] (discovery types: 'volume-mdisk','volume','mdisk','pool'). The script sends volume/mdisk/pool LLD JSON data to LLD trapper items "svc.discovery.<volume-mdisk|volume|mdisk|pool>" and should be used with "_Special_Storwize_Perf" Zabbix template. See also http://www.zabbix.com/documentation/2.0/manual/discovery/low_level_discovery.
